page.title: 04RELIGION IN BRAMHALL.
page.content: I am 13 years old and I live in Bramhall. I do not have much to do with religion except at school. Three out of thirty children visit the church which is not many compared to the number of churches in Bramhall. This is mainly because people do not have any time for God or religion, also most people go to work; some can not give up time to visit church. Also some people would not enjoy going as they have never been to church and do not know much about churches or God. Near Parkside council estate there is a church; the St.Vincent de Paul which is Roman Catholic; it has about 2,000 attending. It is not very big, but is very popular. Once I went to it and it was full of people standing up and singing.
